welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rotonda, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Venice Municipal Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Venice Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charlotte County Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The General Aviation Terminal at Charlotte County Airport serves private and charter flights, offering a comfortable and convenient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
